c:atomType.name: MultiChartOverflow
c:atomType.c:documentation: The possible strategies for when the number of small charts overflows the initial chart dimensions.

c:atom.name: Grow
c:atom.c:documentation: The chart grows in size as needed to fit all of the small-charts.

c:atom.name: Fit
c:atom.c:documentation: The small-charts are sized so that they all fit the initial chart size.

c:atom.name: Clip
c:atom.c:documentation:
Only the first small-charts that entirely fit in the initial chart size are actually shown.
An overflow indicator is shown by default.
